data.text: Mndewa Imulungu, kumwako noika loho yangu.
Mndewa Imulungu, kumwako notamanila,
Sikuumuleke imunhu yokutamanila yakone kinyala,
Unongele nzila zako, gweye Mndewa Imulungu,
Unilongoze mna ikweli yako na unifunze,
Kumbuka bazi jako gweye Mndewa Imulungu,
Sikuuzikumbuke nzambi na gehile ga ubwanga wangu,
Mndewa Imulungu kanoga na katelela,
Kowalongoza wahole mzimbuli zinogile,
Mndewa Imulungu, kotenda kwa unogelo wake hawishaga na kutamanilwa,
Mbuli ya twaga jako, gweye Mndewa Imulungu,
Kila munhu yomdumba Mndewa Imulungu,
Munhu kamba ayo komweda siku zose,
Mndewa Imulungu mbwiga wa awo omdumba,
Nomulola Mndewa Imulungu siku zose,
Mndewa Imulungu, unilole na unyonele bazi,
Unisegesele magazo ga mmoyo wangu,
Ugalole magazo gangu na madununzo gangu,
Lola iwanhu onihila viwali wengi,
Uulole goya ugima wangu, unikombole nokukimbilila gweye,
Ganogile na haki vinikalize,
Imulungu, uwakombole wanhu wako wa Izilaeli,
